title: Analyze Bus Schedule Adherence
description: The transit manager wants a report on which bus routes most frequently run late.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical GPS and schedule data for all bus routes over the past month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the transit database.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to calculate the on-time performance percentage for each route.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the performance metrics for every route.

tasks.description: Generate a report ranking the routes from worst to best on-time performance, highlighting the three worst-performing routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear, actionable report for the transit manager.
